description.p: Everything you need to create simple and beautiful presentations with text, images, and shapes. Add some spice to your presentations with a wide variety of background patterns and beautiful color palette.

ul.li: Exporting to PDF!
Presentation Browser: Scroll though the presentations you have made and jump right into them with one click!.
Controller Support: If you have a USB or Bluetooth controller, plug it in and control your slides!
Templates, so you can whip up a presentation in a blink of an eye.
You can edit images in your favorite editor, and it will automatically update when saved
Creating a new presentation now brings up templates you can choose from.
You can now replace images right from Spice-Up.
Making a new slide now picks up the style from your last one.
You can now make Text and Shapes transparent, right from the custom color picker!
Fixed: Double clicking would sometimes unselect the item.
Fixed: The text on the roundness slider was hard to read.
Spice-Up is also now available in Spanish!
Selecting slides, and colors on the color picker now feels like you actually press something.
ColorPicker: Click on the preview to be able to set both colors at once.
A better high resolution icon
Fixed: Spice-Up should now work a lot better with other themes
Fixed: Sometimes, the default blue color would get selected
Shapes: You can now set the roundness of the square, and finally make circles!
Cut, copy, and paste slides, and canvas items!
The presentations you make will appear on the welcome screen for easy access to them!
